def_en: If you say that someone or something is in limbo, you mean that they are in a situation where they seem to be caught between two stages and it is unclear what will happen next.

def_cn: 林波舞（西印度群岛的一种舞蹈，舞者需后仰，从离地越来越近的杆下通过）
def_en: The limbo is a West Indian dance in which you have to pass under a low bar while leaning backwards. The bar is moved nearer to the floor each time you go under it.
